vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κόρος, ὁ,

__DHebrew kor, a dry measure containing, accusative to [NT+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: cor (dry measure between ten and twelve bushels)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
cor (dry measure between ten and twelve bushels)
a cor, the largest Jewish measure for things dry, equal to the homer, and about fifteen bushels English, according to Josephus, Lk. 16:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: medida (una medida seca de aproximadamente 10-12 fanegas)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
一石 (路 16:7)
希伯來人的乾量單位,約三百五十公升
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
一石 (路 16:7)
希伯来人的干量单位,约三百五十公升
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cô-rơ; cô-ra; co-ru; hộc nguyên văn, “co-ru.” Một co-ru tương đương với khoảng 393 lít. giạ H3734
